amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 119-1 to allow the U.S. Forest Service to approve the removal of hazardous trees near power lines on federal land without requiring a timber sale, easing a serious threat that has in the past been a major cause of destructive wildfires.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carbajal amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carbajal amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
